plays.text: Goal scored by Darren McCarty assisted by Sean Avery and Jesse Wallin
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Mathieu Dandenault
Goal scored by Andrei Nazarov assisted by Ladislav Nagy and Kelly Buchberger
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Briere
Penalty to Branko Radivojevic 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Brendan Shanahan
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Jason Woolley and Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Daniel Briere
Goal scored by Tony Amonte assisted by Daniel Briere and Brian Savage
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Slashing Sean Avery
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Diving Danny Markov
Penalty to Shane Doan 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Kirk Maltby unassisted
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Illegal Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Shane Doan assisted by Daymond Langkow and Mike Johnson
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Brett Hull 2 minutes for High Sticking Daniel Briere
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom unassisted
